response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which holds significant value for us at $12,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents a substantial saving compared to our standard pricing. I look forward to hearing your thoughts on this proposal.", "product_price": 9500}
